bibl.title: A Little-known Collection of Papyri in the British Library.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. I
bibl.author: Pattie, Thomas S.

bibl.note: About one thousand folders of unglazed papyri set aside by Kenyon and Bell. One Biblical text on vellum (folder 0507e) contains Psalm 30 (31 Vulgate), verses 14-17, dated 4th or 5th century. - P. 148: some new geographical places and list of names of persons.
Pattie Thomas S., A Little-known Collection of Papyri in the British Library.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. I (Athens, 1988) pp. 147-150.
